headline: Limited Time Sale Just for You
content:
Get exclusive discounts on 3 formidable high-performance vehicles this week: take 50% off the space-age Grotti X80 Proto, the blazingly fast Pegassi Reaper, and the futuristic Nagasaki Shotaro sports bike.

The race-ready Dewbauchee Specter Sports car is also on sale at 25% off. Store your growing fleet in a new 10-car garage, which are all 25% off until March 13.
